trait.name: Charge
entries: If the bungisngis moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Horrid Giggling
entries: The bungisngis incessantly emits a magical, infectious giggling sound. When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the bungisngis and is able to hear the bungisngis, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw, unless the bungisngis is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the target is {@condition charmed} until the start of its next turn or until it takes damage. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the target falls {@condition prone} and starts giggling uncontrollably, becoming {@condition incapacitated} and unable to stand up. A creature with an Intelligence score of 4 or less isn't affected.
If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the bungisngis's Horrid Giggling for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The bungisngis has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The bungisngis has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bungisngis makes two attacks. one with its Tusk and one with its Claws.

action.name: Tusk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.
